tool_description: Generate barcodes for your shop and your inventory
name: Quick Barcodes
title: Quick Barcodes

api_list.name: Create Barcode
api_list.description:
Generate your barcode,
```{"barcode_type":<BARCODE_TYPE>, "text":<TEXT>}```

<TEXT> is the text to generate the barcode from
<BARCODE_TYPE> is the barcode style you want to use:

Values for each type:
EAN-8: "ean8"
EAN-13: "ean13"
EAN-14: "ean14"
ISBN-10: "isbn10"
ISBN-13: "isbn13"
ISSN: "issn"
Code 39: "code39"
Code 128: "code128"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-barcodes.p.rapidapi.com/barcode/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-barcodes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-barcodes.p.rapidapi.com/barcode/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-barcodes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
